roleset.name: (cause to) tint, tinge, color lightly

example.name: Metaphorical tincture
example.text: In addition, it revealed that the "Persian-national" spirit that tinctures Iran's foreign policy and its various positions, far from the claims of enmity to America and Israel, are only used to serve Iran's interests.
example.arg: Iran's foreign policy and its various positions,

roleset.note: TINCTURE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from tincture.01-v)
